alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Mineral; Sanders (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Avalanche Watch issued February 20 at 6:32AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Idaho Panhandle Avalanche Center Sandpoint ID ...The Idaho Panhandle Avalanche Center Sandpoint ID has issued Backcountry Avalanche Watch... * WHAT...The avalanche danger for the warning area may rise to high by Tuesday morning. * WHERE...St. Regis Basin and Silver Valley Zones. Selkirk Mountains, West Cabinet Mountains along Montana/Idaho Border and East Cabinet Mountains . * WHEN...In effect from Mon 06:00 PST to Tue 06:00 PST. * IMPACTS...Heavy snowfall and strong winds are predicted over the next 48 hours. Large avalanches at upper elevations and smaller avalanches below tree line will be likely by Tuesday.
info.instruction: Very dangerous avalanche conditions. Travel in avalanche terrain is not recommended. Avalanches may run long distances and can run into mature forests, valley floors, or flat terrain. Consult http://www.idahopanhandleavalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of any Avalanche Center.
